<h1 align="center">
  Dot Search API
</h1>

Welcome to the backend side of the Dot Search website!

_Have an idea for our website? You can drop a suggestion in our [Discord server](https://invite.gg/dot) or [create an issue in this repo](/issues/new)._

# API Endpoints

- ```/v1/search``` - Regular Search Endpoint (POST)
- ```/v1/search/images``` - Image Search Endpoint (POST)
- ```/v1/search/videos``` - Video Search Endpoint (POST)
- ```/v1/search/news``` - News Search Endpoint (POST)
- ```/v1/autocomplete/:query``` - AutoComplete Endpoint (GET)
